overview: Hannah and Scott are like night and day. She is granola; he is metal. She owns a spa; he is a tattoo artist. She enjoys yoga; he likes beer. Yet despite their differences, its love at first sight. That is...until their meddling best friends Alexis and Doug convince each of them that the other is having an affair.
tagline: Opposites attract, but can they survive and get to their own happy ending?
title: Happy Endings
